sentences.en: Changes in the stock market are, of course, highly un - predictable .
sentences.cn: 股票市场的变化当然是 变幻莫测.

sentences.en: Compare the negative prefixesnon -, un -, dis - and a -.
sentences.cn: 试比较含否定意义的前缀non - 、 un - 、 dis - 、a -.

sentences.en: Compare the negative prefixesnon -, un -, dis - and a -.
sentences.cn: 试比较含否定意义的前缀non - 、 un - 、 dis - 、a -.

sentences.en: Fifty thousand dollars to Copenhagen , 100,000 deutsche marks to Helsinki.
He went fishing and caught a big'un.
sentences.cn: 他去钓鱼,钓到一条大的.

sentences.en: I can't account for Peter's un happiness.
sentences.cn: 我 说 不出彼得不高兴的原因.

sentences.en: In - is used with fewer words than un -, also to form opposites.
sentences.cn: in - 也用以构成反义词,但能与之结合的词较un - 少些.

sentences.en: In English, & quot ; un & quot ; is a prefix for negative words.
sentences.cn: 在英语中, 加有“ un ”前缀的词是否定词.

sentences.en: In the word " unimportant " , " un - " is a prefix.
sentences.cn: 在单词 unimportant 中un是前缀.

sentences.en: It'seems that it's not the un - opening mansion anymore.
sentences.cn: 它不再是个不 对外开放 的公寓了.

sentences.en: The affixes " un - " and " - less " are often used make negative words, such as unhappy or careless.
sentences.cn: 词缀un - 和 -less 常用来构成否定词, 如unhappy和careless.

sentences.en: The crowd was taken aback: he was certainly a game'un , this " Chamber - pot "!
sentences.cn: 群众出了意外的一怔.潮水停住了.这 “ 夜壶 ” 好大胆呀!

sentences.en: Un - hun . That's what I thought you said.
You don't think she was completely un - classy and predatory?
sentences.cn: 难道你不认为她低俗和暴露了一点?

trans.tran_cn: 联合国（United Nations），硝酸铀铣（Uranyl Nitrate）
